ovdesc.p: This ‘L’ type application is automatically generated by the authorization/processing of a:
• FUNDS.TRANSFER via a specific version or generated by a scheduled standing order (*),
• LOT.PROCESS (Generic application allowing the payment and dispatching of any transaction file received from a corporate customer or a credit card transactions/cheques collection company),
• SEPA.INWARD if the SEPA inward file’s sender is a customer (SENDER.RECEIVER = ‘CB’)
Each record contains the transaction information details, the booking entries, comments, errors and overrides as well as the key of the T24 application above that has generated it.

The T24 ‘Reverse action on any of these applications’ record will automatically trigger the removal of the SEPA outward message from the outward pending files or, post a reversal SEPA message in this file, if the Transaction Information has already been sent within an outward XML message.

It holds the mapped SEPA XML Transaction Information and all the fields needed for a later selection by any standard T24 enquiries. It suits reporting or auditing purposes but also allows an easy reversal action in the future.
Its key has the following format: yyyymmdd.nnn.sssssss where:
• yyyymmdd is the presentation date foreseen for the SEPA XML message,
• nnn is the operation code (as defined in the key of SEPA.LAYOUT file),
• sssssss is the sequential number given to the transaction stored for the presentation day (number of available digits is given at field SEQUENCE.DIGITS of SEPA.PARAMETER).

(*) A delivered batch program (SEPA.BUILD.STO.PAYMENT) is to be included in the COB after the generation of FUNDS.TRANSFER live or non validated – depending on the account status and balance - by the batch program FT.STO.PAY using the periodic ‘PP’ and fixed ‘FI’ matured STANDING.ORDER. Its function is to intercept these FUNDS.TRANSFER records (their INWARD.PAY.TYPE field begins with “STO-”), to enrich them with the equivalent local references fields belonging to the STANDING.ORDER record and necessary for the mapping of the outward XML message and to trigger the generation of the SEPA.OUTWARD records.

desc.p: This field defines the Type of calculation for the charges:
Value upto 20 and User can Input only values 'CREDIT LESS CHARGES' or 'DEBIT PLUS CHARGES' or 'WAIVE'
This field holds the Key to FT.CHARGE.TYPE to define charges
The default value comes from the layout or parameter FTTC but it can be changed by a validation routine as any other field of the application.
Value should exist in FT.CHARGE.TYPE Application and Multi Value Set
This field denotes the Company code.
This field contains the Amount of any commission prefixed by its currency. May be signed for discount.
Associated Multi Value Set of field COMMISSION.TYPE
This field defines the Type of calculation for the commissions:
Value upto 20 and User can Input only values 'CREDIT LESS CHARGES' or 'DEBIT PLUS CHARGES' or 'WAIVE'
This field holds the Key to FT.COMMISSION.TYPE definition..
The default value comes from the layout or parameter FTTC but it can be changed by a validation routine as any other field of the application.
Value should exist in FT.COMMISSION.TYPE Application and Multi Value Set
This field contains the Effective date of the XML message generation. The record is no more available for an outward extraction as soon as this date is completed.
This allows a clean restart of a failed treatment without processing the same records twice.
This field contains the Exact time of the start of extraction allowing a further selection of the records concerned by a single batch treatment.
This field contains the Credited account number
Value should exist in ACCOUNT Application
This field contains the Gross credit amount
This field contains the amount to be charged which is equal to Total amount of charges + commissions.
This field specifies the Credit currency
Value should exist in CURRENCY Application
This field specifies the Credit reference
This field contains the Credit value date
This field specifies the Identification of the Direct Debit creditor.
This field contains the Current version of the record.
This field holds the Key to the SEPA.INWARD.DETAIL:’,’:rank of related transaction in CB message.
This field contains the Id of the Handing over customer
Value should exist in CUSTOMER Application
This field holds the Key generated by outward process.
This field contains Date and time of treatment start.
This field contains Debited account Number
Value should exist in ACCOUNT Application
This field contains the Net credit amount
This field contains the Gross debit amount
This field specifies the Debit currency
In case of reverse – not used.
In case of reverse – not used.
SEPA.LAYOUT Id of the forward B2B pacs message for processed Inward C2B Pain message
Value should exist in SEPA.LAYOUT Application
Specifies the type of channel through which this message is received by the bank i.e, B2B (Bank to Bank) or C2B (Customer to Bank)
Value upto 3 and Multi value Field
Values can be added or modified using VIRTUAL Table with key SEPA.CHANNEL
Optional account to book separately the charges and commissions if foreseen in the T24 customer convention or to take fees for a non financial operation initiated by the customer.
Value should exist in ACCOUNT Application
Amount of any charge prefixed by its currency. May be signed for discount.
Associated Multi Value Set of field CHARGE.TYPE
Type of calculation for the charges:
Value upto 20 and User can Input only values 'CREDIT LESS CHARGES' or 'DEBIT PLUS CHARGES' or 'WAIVE'
Key to FT.CHARGE.TYPE to define charges.
The default value comes from the layout or parameter FTTC but it can be changed by a validation routine as all other fields.
Value should exist in FT.CHARGE.TYPE Application and Multi Value Set
Amount of any commission prefixed by its currency. May be signed for discount.
Associated Multi Value Set of field COMMISSION.TYPE
Type of calculation for the commissions:
Value upto 20 and User can Input only values 'CREDIT LESS CHARGES' or 'DEBIT PLUS CHARGES' or 'WAIVE'
The default value comes from the layout or parameter FTTC but it can be changed by a validation routine as all other fields.
Value should exist in FT.COMMISSION.TYPE Application and Multi Value Set
Value should exist in ACCOUNT Application
Value should exist in CURRENCY Application
Creditor Identification. Used for SEPA Direct Debits.
Current version of the record – always 1.
Key to the SEPA.INWARD.DETAIL:’,’:rank of related transaction in the CB message.
Value should exist in CUSTOMER Application
Date and time of treatment start.
Value should exist in ACCOUNT Application
Value should exist in CURRENCY Application
This field specifies the Debit reference
This field contains the Debit value date
This field specifies the Reference of the issued customer advice
This field contains the Department code of the operator.
This field contains the Exchange rate between the technical account and the counterparty nostro.
This field holds the Key of the generating application.
This field holds the SEPA.MSG.CONCAT key. 1st for operation itself, 2nd - if any - for the previous one.
Associated Multi Value set of field HIST.TXN.ID
This field specifies the List of operations linked to this one.
Value upto 22 type ANY(Any Character) and Multi Value field
This field contains the Net debit amount
This field holds the SEPA.TXN.CONCAT key. 1st for operation itself, 2nd - if any - for the previous one
This field holds the Reason for a return/refund generation.
This field contains the T24 ACCOUNT of the bank’s customer
Value should exist in ACCOUNT Application
This field contains the Address of the bank’s customer
This field contains the Initial amount of the transaction
This field contains the Branch of the bank’s customer
This field contains the Initial currency of the transaction
Value should exist in CURRENCY Application
This field contains the Identification of the bank’s customer.
Value should exist in CUSTOMER Application
This field contains the IBAN account of the bank’s customer.
This field contains the Name of the bank’s customer.
This field is used In case of reverse.
This field contains the Identification of the user.
This field contains the Mandate identification for direct debit.
This field holds the Operation code as define in the key.
Value upto 3 type A(Alphanumeric) with 2 preceeding Zero's
This field specifies the Reference of the sender’s bank
This field contains the List of the XML transaction elements pre-selected for a distinct storage available as select key for future record retrieval.
This field contains the Transaction Information stored in such a way that it can be shown easily as it was in its original XML presentation by a delivered T24 drill down enquiry.
This field is defaulted with Override message generated for this application.
This field holds the Inward file key for uploaded pain-files
This field provides a Narrative of the transaction.
This field contains the Destination PE-ACH platform center
Value should exist in SEPA.PEACH Application
This field is used In case of reverse.
This field contains the Settlement date
This field contains the Customer Id to be used to identify the booking profit center.
Value should exist in CUSTOMER Application
This field holds the Key to DEPT.ACCT.OFFICER to identify an account officer as profit center. These 2 last fields are mutually exclusive.
Value upto 4 type DAO(DEPT Accounting Officer)
Value should exist in DEPT.ACCT.OFFICER Application
This field specifies the Return/refund or reversal reason.
This field holds the Status of the record.
This field Specifies the reason code made for reversal of transaction
This field provides a Short Description for rejection purpose
This field specifies the Date on which the direct debit is signed
This field denotes the Sequence value for Direct debit
Possible value are FRST - First / RCUR - Recurrent / FNAL - Final / OOFF - One Off
Value upto 4 and User can input only 'FRST' or 'RCUR' or 'FNAL' or 'Final' or 'OOFF'
Values can be added or modified using VIRTUAL Table with key SDD.SEQUENCE
This field specifies the Status of Direct debit
Value upto 7 and User can input only 'AUTH' or 'NOTAUTH'
Values can be added or modified using VIRTUAL Table with key SDD.STATUS
This field defines the Identification of the authorizer.
This field specifies the Type of Direct debit
Value upto 4 and User can input only 'B2B' or 'CORE'
Values can be added or modified using VIRTUAL Table with key SDD.TYPE
This field specifies the Reference of the accounting entries.
A context enquiry allows a drill down.
This field hold the Status of the transaction posted.
Value upto 3 and User can input only 'ACP' or 'CXL' or 'PND ' or 'PRC ' or 'RCV' or 'RDY' or 'REJ' or 'RET' or 'SND' or 'TRF'
This field Gives the amount of taxes taken from the client, nostro or charge account.
Associated Multi Value Set of field TAX.TYPE
This field holds the Key to TAX.TYPE giving the type of each calculated tax.
Value should exist in TAX.TYPE Application and Multi Value Set
This field contains the Address of the receiver
This field contains the BIC code of the receiver’s bank
This field contains the Branch code of the receiver’s bank
This field contains the IBAN account of the receiver
This field contains the Name of the receiver
This field Specifies the type of channel i.e, B2B (Bank to Bank) or C2B (Customer to Bank)
Value upto 3 and Multi value Field
Values can be added or modified using VIRTUAL Table with key SEPA.CHANNEL
This field specifies the Reference of the sender
This field holds the Key to FT.TXN.TYPE.CONDITION giving the payment conditions for the customer
Value should exist in FT.TXN.TYPE.CONDITION Application

This field contains the Optional account to book separately the charges and commissions if foreseen in the T24 customer convention or to take fees for a non financial operation initiated by the customer.
Value should exist in ACCOUNT Application
This field contains the Amount of any charge prefixed by its currency. May be signed for discount.
Associated Multi Value Set of field CHARGE.TYPE
Specifies the category purpose as published in an external category purpose code list from SEPA.CATEG.PURPOSE or specifies the Category purpose in a proprietary form.
Specifies the purpose as published in an external purpose code list from SEPA.PURPOSE.CODE or specifies the purpose in a proprietary form.
This field is populated from SEPA.FOLLOW.UP and it holds the compensation amount calculated from transaction amount based on the EONIA rate inputted in SEPA.FOLLOW.UP.
This field holds the end to end id extracted from transaction
This field holds details mentioned in the Strd Remittance information extracted from transaction
This field holds additional information to be mapped to the xml file
This field holds actual settlement date extracted from the xml file
This field holds the value of Processing Date when the payment is initiated.
The value will be populated to the tag AccptncDtTm in Outward XML
